title: nIyallAl enakkoru
sahitya:
nIyallAl enakkoru nilaiyillai un nEsamallAl oru kalaiyillai paramA


anupallavi

  pEi manam aDangiyun perum karuNai tannaip-piriyAmal irundiDum varam taruvAi appA


caraNam    Unuyir vAzhvoru paradEsi inda ulagam brahmANDattil oru siru dUsi
yAnena uyirppadum iraiva nin Asi enakkuL aruL mantiram upadEsi guruvE
